text: @realDonaldTrump Pardon the interruption and delay? Screw you, Donny! 6+ hours and you exposed thousands to #COVID19 because, as usual, YOU HAD INADEQUATELY PLANNED FOR THAT STUPID TRAVEL BAN THAT IS USELESS!
